name: Magician: Tarot Mastery (DEMO)
description:
Welcome, aspiring lightworker! I see that "Spirit" has guided you to this page.

Tarot is considered a mystery to many, but even in this modern age the esoteric practice thrives.  This demo of Magician: Tarot Mastery aims to explore tarot through the lens of an app called Manifest. 

Each day, you will receive messages from ordinary people who seek answers that are beyond our worldly reach. You are to provide guidance by choosing one of the three tarot cards displayed. Each of the 78 cards has a unique meaning; in the demo, you can hover over each displayed card to learn about it.

Always remember that the universe makes no mistakes. Any outcome, whether positive or negative, is a part of the journey. There is no losing in Magician - only discovery.
